description:
A practical mix-and-match paddling piece. We’ve designed it to be paired with the Fusion Shorts or Capris for core insulation in warm water and warm weather, or with the Fusion Pants as a convenient alternative to a full Farmer John in cooler conditions.

The Fusion series combines years of material development with exceptionally sophisticated patterning to produce neoprene that’s comfortable to wear while you're active, and warmer in the water if you swim.

  • 2mm, four-way super-stretch neoprene for maximum comfort and fit
  • Long in the back for good coverage when seated in a kayak or canoe
name: MEC Fusion Neoprene Vest - Men's
